token.desc: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

manifest.desc: The manifest to be validated. Will be validated against the [app manifest schema - read our guide](/app-manifests/configuring-apps-with-app-manifests#fields).

app_id.desc: The ID of the app whose configuration you want to validate.

warnings.desc: Non-blocking warnings from app manifest validation.

app_not_eligible.desc: The specified app is not eligible for this API.

invalid_app.desc: An app created from the provided manifest would not be valid.

invalid_app_id.desc: The app id passed is invalid.

invalid_manifest.desc: The provided manifest file does not validate against schema.

failed_adding_collaborator.desc: Failed writing a collaborator record for this new app

failed_creating_app.desc: Failed to create the app model

no_permission.desc: User described by the used token does not have proper permissions to take this action.

error.description: Typical error response if invalid manifest schema used

errors.message: Event Subscription requires either Request URL or Socket Mode Enabled
